data.title: 17 years of Venkat Prabhu: Films of the director you cannot miss watching on OTT
data.meta_description: Director Venkat Prabhu is responsible for several hit films over his 17-year-long career. We list some of his movies that you must watch on OTT right
data.text:
It’s been 17 years since director Venkat Prabhu made his directorial debut with Chennai 600028. The film not only went on to become a cult sports comedy Tamil film but also helped the director make a mark for himself through his unique and quirky storytelling style. Many of his films, which feature a regular ensemble cast, are funny and have interesting narratives. As he is currently working with Vijay in GOAT, we have listed 5 Venkat Prabhu films that you can stream on OTT right now.

Venkat Prabhu films to watch on OTT

Mankatha – SunNXT

Mankatha is headlined by Ajith Kumar and went on to become a commercial success that used the stardom of the actor to the fullest. Venkat Prabhu experimented with Ajith Kumar’s character and even brought out his negative shades. Mankatha is about a suspended cop who meets a group of boys and whips up a plan to steal Rs 500 crore owned by a gangster. The film also stars Trisha, Arjun, Lakshmi Rai, Anjali, Vaibhav and others.

Also read: 17 years of Chennai 600028: Here is where you can stream Venkat Prabhu’s sports comedy drama

Chennai 600028 – SunNXT

Chennai 600028 marked the directorial debut of Venkat Prabhu and is one of the first few films to portray street cricket. The film is about two rival cricket teams who face off in local tournaments. The sports comedy film explores the themes of friendship, romance, and sportsmanship and has ample portions of comedy that evoke laughs. The film stars Jai, Shiva, Premgi, Aravind Akash and others.

Also read: The GOAT director, Venkat Prabhu, to also star in the movie? Details about his character are here..

Maanaadu – SonyLIV

Maanaadu is a sci-fi political thriller featuring Silambarasan in the lead role. The film stars the actor as NRI Abdul Khaliq, who returns to India for his friend’s wedding. However, in a bizarre turn of events, he gets stuck in a time loop and has to stop the assassination of the chief minister of the state. The film was a commercial success upon its release and also stars SJ Suryah, Kalyani Priyadarshan and others.

Goa – SunNXT

Goa is a buddy comedy film starring Jai, Premgi, Vaibhav, Sneha, Pia Bajpai and others. The film revolves around three rural youngsters who travel to Goa to get fresh experiences and escape their native. There, they get accustomed to a new and free lifestyle as they fall in love with different women. Goa is also one of the early Tamil films to progressively show homosexuality.

Saroja – Prime Video

Saroja is a crime comedy film starring Shiva, Vaibhav, Premji, SP Charan, Vega Tamotia, Jayaram, Prakash Raj, Sampath Raj, Nikita Thukral, Bose Venkat and Kajal Aggarwal, among others. The film is about four young men who travel to Hyderabad from Chennai to watch a match but as they take a diversion, they see themselves asked for help by a schoolgirl who is kidnapped.
